EmailTemplate.subject: Please complete your NCT membership
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
$title
Membership cancelled
View in browser
Local activities & meet ups
Get involved
About us
Hi {!npe03__Recurring_Donation__c.First_Contact__c}
Thanks for getting in touch, we'd love to have you as a member!
To complete your membership, please click on the payment link below:
Payment Link : Click here
Thanks again!
The membership team
Please do not reply to this email.
If you no longer wish to receive emails from NCT or wish to choose the types of email we send to you, please click here: Want to unsubscribe or change your details.
You can resubscribe at any time by visiting our website to register your details.
2018 NCT, 30 Euston Square, London, NW1 2FB.
Reg Charity No (England and Wales): 801395, (Scotland): SC041592. Reg Company No: 2370573.
